remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此委托提供在服务器上执行验证的自定义代码。Use this delegate to provide custom code that performs validation on the server. 你的代码需要验证传递给委托的 `args` 参数的 属性。Your code needs to validate the property of the `args` parameter passed to the delegate. 将验证的结果存储在 `args` 参数的 属性中。Store the result of the validation in the property of the `args` parameter. 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为服务器端 指定和编写处理程序。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for a server-side . 它显示输入到文本框中的数字是奇数还是偶数。It displays whether a number entered into a text box is odd or even.
